title: linking with gcc failed

labels.name: A-linkage
labels.description: Area: linking into static, shared libraries and binaries

body:
This has bugged me enough to post an issue. I've got some code on a network drive and sometimes when I build it using rustc I will get this error. If I retry rustc a few times it eventually compiles. This does not happen when I move the code to my local C: drive. 

error: linking with `gcc` failed: exit code: 1
note: gcc '-Wl,--enable-long-section-names' '-fno-use-linker-plugin' '-Wl,--nxco
mpat' '-static-libgcc' '-m64' '-L' 'C:\Rust\bin\rustlib\x86_64-pc-windows-gnu\li
b' '-o' 'MyProgram.exe' 'MyProgram.o' '-Wl,--gc-sections' 'C:\Rust\bin\rustlib
\x86_64-pc-windows-gnu\lib\libstd-4e7c5e5c.rlib' 'C:\Rust\bin\rustlib\x86_64-pc-
windows-gnu\lib\libcollections-4e7c5e5c.rlib' 'C:\Rust\bin\rustlib\x86_64-pc-win
dows-gnu\lib\libunicode-4e7c5e5c.rlib' 'C:\Rust\bin\rustlib\x86_64-pc-windows-gn
u\lib\librand-4e7c5e5c.rlib' 'C:\Rust\bin\rustlib\x86_64-pc-windows-gnu\lib\liba
lloc-4e7c5e5c.rlib' 'C:\Rust\bin\rustlib\x86_64-pc-windows-gnu\lib\liblibc-4e7c5
e5c.rlib' 'C:\Rust\bin\rustlib\x86_64-pc-windows-gnu\lib\libcore-4e7c5e5c.rlib'
'-L' 'C:\Rust\bin\rustlib\x86_64-pc-windows-gnu\lib' '-L' 'U:\RustProjects\Block
Solve\src.rust\bin\x86_64-pc-windows-gnu' '-L' 'U:\RustProjects\MyProgram\src\
bin\x86_64-pc-windows-gnu' '-Wl,--whole-archive' '-Wl,-Bstatic' '-Wl,--no-whole-
archive' '-Wl,-Bdynamic' '-lws2_32' '-lcompiler-rt'
note: ld: cannot open output file MyProgram.exe: Permission denied
